revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Silph Co |image = [[File:Silph Co.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of Silph Co. |tokens = 875 |location = Saffron City }} The '''Silph Co''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 10,515 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->

<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> After Reaching Sinnoh, the drop chance for items in Kanto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:11--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || 3 || 32.43% || 32.43% || 32.43% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || 2 || 21.62% || 21.62% || 21.62% |- | {{Bag2|Pokéball}} || N/A || 10.81% || 10.81% || 10.81% |- | {{Pokemon|Electrode|mimic}} || N/A || 10.81% || 10.81% || 10.81% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 12.11% || 12.11% || 12.11% |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 12.11% || 12.11% || 12.11% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 0.10% || 0.10% || 0.10% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |} </tab> </tabs>
